content: CryptoLand Token Bounty Campaign [✅PAID] | Total 100k Token Reward Poll | EscrowedBounty Distribution CompleteSpreadsheetCrypto Land websiteCrypto Land Telegram Channell Crypto Land TwitterCrypto Land Facebook Bounty Channel Bounty group Genarel Rules ● Bounty Campaign Dates: October 02 - October 22 lasts for 3 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 15 Days after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Proof Authentication post is mandatory participation.● Any from of cheating is not allowed and will result in disqualification.● Negative trust-rated accounts are not allowed to participate● Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread!Bounty Allocation Twitter 65%Telegram 20Facebook 15%Already EscrowedWeek Duration 3 Week 02/10/22 - 08/10/2209/10/22 - 15/10/2216/10/22 - 22/10/22Twitter CampaignREWARD● 300 to 1000 readers: 1 stake      ● 1001 to 2000 readers: 2 stakes● 2001 - 3000 readers: 3 stakes    ● 3001 - 4000 readers: 4 stakes ● 4001- 5000 readers: 5 stakes    ● 5001- 10000 readers: 7 stakes ● 10000+ readers: 10 stakesRULES● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow must be our official Twitter ● Make 2 Tweets Per week.  Your posts should have hashtags Use ● Make 5 Like & Retweet Our official Twitter  have hashtags: #CryptoToken #Polygon #Staking #Rewards #MATIC #CryptoLandToken #Dynamic_BountyJoin NowFacebook campaignRULES ● Must have at least 500 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow must be our official Facebook ● Make 2 POst Per week.  Your posts should have hashtags Use ● Make 5 Share Our official Facebook page  have hashtags Use : #CryptoToken #Polygon #Staking #Rewards #MATIC #CryptoLandToken #Dynamic_BountyREWARD● 500 to 1000 readers: 1 stake      ● 1001 to 2000 readers: 2 stakes● 2001 - 3000 readers: 3 stakes    ● 3001 - 4000 readers: 4 stakes ● 4001- 5000 readers: 5 stakesJoin NowTelegram Campaign Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (5 stakes/week)● 10 stakes once for wearing a "Your Name |” + LOGO.RULES ● Join - Telegram● Make a maximum 1 comments per 1 day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group ( Minimun 500 Members Group Mandatory )Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Telegram campaignJoin NowMaster SpreadsheetCode:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated:Polygon Wallet Address:Code:campaign twitter Twitter profile link : Tweet link 1: Tweet link 2: Retweet link 1:Retweet link 2:Retweet link 3:Retweet link 4:Retweet link 5: Code:campaign facebook facebook profile link : Post link 1: Post link 2: Share link 1:Share link 2:Share link 3:Share link 4:Share link 5:
